page.title: 07Local History contd.
page.content:
Last year a new bar was installed with the help of the Manpower Services.The Hall has a large modern kitchen and can cater for upto 120 people,and regularly does so.It has toilet facilities,storage facilities and outdoor tennis courts,netball and floodlit 5 a_side football pitch. A typical weeks usage of the Hall is
Monday:_ 7_9.30p.m.W.I.
Tuesday:_7_9.30p.m.Hall Committee<bar> 7_8.00p.m Archery<hall> 8_9.00p.m.Keep fit<hall> Wednes:_ 11a.m._3p.m.Friendship Club <Age_Concern> 7.30_10p.m.Carpet Bowls. 7.30_9p.m 5 a_side Football <outside>
